experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Agent-Based Epidemic Model For COVID-19- Simulation Model to estimate the propagation and impact of a pandemic. - Analyzed and defined various parameters to predict the data for the COVID 19 cases in India.- Used statistical algorithm to predict the values and found the relation between the various parameters through Sensitivity Analysis.- Plotted graphs for various possibilities and analyzed trends and seasonality.
experience.description_html: Agent-Based Epidemic Model For COVID-19- Simulation Model to estimate the propagation and impact of a pandemic. - Analyzed and defined various parameters to predict the data for the COVID 19 cases in India.- Used statistical algorithm to predict the values and found the relation between the various parameters through Sensitivity Analysis.- Plotted graphs for various possibilities and analyzed trends and seasonality. <!---->

experience.title: GES Intern
experience.description: - GES stands for Global Entrepreneurship Summit (2019), which is IIT Kharagpur's annual, international, corporate summit conducted by Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur, witnessing a footfall of 1400+ students from various colleges in India.- Responsible for publicizing GES 2019 in the city of Begusarai and Bhagalpur by publishing 6 media articles and visiting 15 colleges.- Contributed to the Accommodation team of Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur.
